# SuShengJie Package

This is an example Python package.

## Installation

```bash
pip install sushengjie
```

## Usage

```python
import sushengjie.core

message = sushengjie.core.greet("World")
print(message)
```

## Features

- Provides a simple greeting function.
- (Add more features here)
